content.body: We're looking for a software tester to come work with our team of developers at Glasgow to help build great products at the heart of end users.

sections.content:
Responsibilities

As part of the role you will be working to create suitable test process which can be developed into a reusable and robust test framework for use across multiple projects.

Involved with daily software testing to ensure software is bug and defect free.

Essential skills

  • Ability to write test plans and cases
  • The ability to look at a document/application and decide what 'needs' to be tested.
  • The ability to develop test frameworks
  • The ability to drive resolution of bugs/defects
  • The ability to clearly communicate concerns/thoughts
  • The ability to clearly understand requirements/concerns
  • A desire to be a Tester/QA Engineer
  • Manual and Automated Testing Experience
  • Testing on a Scrum/Agile Team
  • Attention to detail
  • Solid communication Skills
  • Be strong scripting or automated testing
  • Have strong capability for defect finding
  • Driven, self-managing and organised

Desirable skills

  • Testing frameworks: JUnit, TDD, BDD (JBehave / Cucumber), Selenium
  • Test suites: Test Link, HPQC
  • Bug tracker: Jira
  • Performance suites: Load Runner, JMeter
  • Coverage tools: Sonar, Clover
  • Code analysis tools : PMD, Findbugs
